::Hot Rod/Skyburst::

He tryes to get free to avoid the freez shots. He activates his eyebeams
to contradict the effecs of the freezing when he is hit.

Meanwhile Skyburst comes in, in helicoptor mode, and starts shooting
50cal. from his gattaling guns at D-13.
